TEXT.TITLE: COLOMBIA DENIES SELLING COFFEE BELOW MARKET
TEXT.BODY: Colombia denied having sold 440,000 60-kg bags of old crop coffee below current market prices to clients in Europe and Asia. A spokesman for the National Coffee Growers Federation, commenting on rumours which had circulated in market circles, said these were false. REUTER
